com.interface21.beans.PropertyValue

Packages that use PropertyValue
com.interface21.beans This package contains interfaces and classes for manipulating Java beans.  
com.interface21.web.bind Provides web-specific data binding functionality, including a utility class for easy invocation of binding and validation.
